/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the entire scene.
